headline: Jim Cramer’s Hidden Gem: Why NextEra Energy (NEP) Is the Undervalued Stock You Need to Know
summary: We recently published a list of the Jim Cramer’s Hidden Gems: 10 Undervalued Stocks You Need to Know. headline: Plug Power: Make Or Break Moment Fast Approaching
summary: Plug Power stock has recovered from its September lows, although still down 50% over the past year. Read why investors should exercise caution with this green energy company.
